articles.content: When the US first banned sales of certain tech products to Chinese tech firm Huawei three years ago, it crippled a once-proud national champion and sent ripples across the US semiconductor industry. … [+6961 chars]

articles.title: First officer fired over Uvalde school shooting response - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Sgt. Juan Maldonado becomes first member of the state police agency to lose his job in the fallout over the hesitant response to the May attack.
